app.name: ExamPrep AI
app.tagline: Prepare smarter for your engineering unified exam with our AI-powered platform

hero.title: Master Your Engineering Exams
hero.subtitle: with AI
hero.description: Prepare smarter for your computer engineering unified exam with our AI-powered platform. Practice with real exam questions and get personalized assistance.

aiQuestions.title: AI-Generated Questions
aiQuestions.description: Practice with AI-generated questions that mirror real exam patterns and difficulty levels

content.title: Comprehensive Content
content.description: Access a vast database of previous exam questions with detailed explanations

progress.title: Track Progress
progress.description: Monitor your performance and identify areas for improvement with detailed analytics

notReady.title: Preview Not Ready
notReady.description: The preview is being generated. Please wait...

export.panelSubtitle: Queue multiple exports tailored for each platform.

empty.title: No exports yet
empty.description: Queue an export to generate platform-ready versions of your project.

drawer.title: Export
drawer.heading: Choose export preset
drawer.subtitle: Select platform presets and quality options to queue your exports.
drawer.resolutionHint: Higher resolutions increase export time and file size.
drawer.fileNameHint: Avoid spaces or special characters. We'll append the file extension automatically.
drawer.includeCaptionsHint: Embed subtitles directly in the exported video.
drawer.notificationsHint: Send a notification once this export finishes.
drawer.queueInfo: Exports run in the background so you can keep working.

youtubeShortsVertical.name: YouTube Shorts 9:16
youtubeShortsVertical.description: Vertical video optimized for Shorts with safe-title padding.

tiktokVertical.name: TikTok 9:16
tiktokVertical.description: High-impact vertical export tuned for TikTok delivery.

instagramVertical.name: Instagram Reels 9:16
instagramVertical.description: Full-height Reels export ready for Instagram distribution.

instagramSquare.name: Instagram Reels 1:1
instagramSquare.description: Square format reel ideal for feed placements.

instagramLandscape.name: Instagram Reels 16:9
instagramLandscape.description: Landscape reel with wide formatting and up to 4K support.

notifications.queueErrorBody: Please review your selections and try again.
notifications.queuedBody: We'll notify you when the {{resolution}} render is ready.
notifications.completedBody: Your export finished successfully and is ready to download.
notifications.failedBody: Review the export logs for more information.
notifications.canceledBody: The export request was canceled before completion.
notifications.retryBody: We'll try rendering this export again.
notifications.retryErrorBody: Please try again in a moment.
notifications.cancelErrorBody: The job may have already completed.
notifications.openFallbackTitle: Opened export in a new tab

questionGeneration.title: Question Generation
questionGeneration.description: Generate practice questions based on specific topics

conceptExplanation.title: Concept Explanation
conceptExplanation.description: Get detailed explanations of complex topics
